  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92348</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92348</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy released in chemical reactions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie gab in chemische Reaktionen frei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'énergie a libéré dans des réactions 
chimiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A energia liberou-se em reações químicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'energia si è liberata nelle reazioni chimiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια που εκδίδεται στις χημικές αντιδράσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La energía release/versión en reacciones 
químicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that energy is released in the formation of water from hydrogen and oxygen atoms.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">formation energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Energie in die 
Anordnung des Wassers vom Wasserstoff und von den Sauerstoffatomen 
freigegeben wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que de l'énergie est 
libérée dans la formation de l'eau des atomes d'hydrogène et 
d'oxygène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a energia está 
liberada na formação da água dos átomos do hidrogênio e de 
oxigênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'energia è 
liberata nella formazione di acqua dagli atomi di ossigeno e 
dell'idrogeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η ενέργεια εκδίδεται 
στο σχηματισμό του ύδατος από τα άτομα υδρογόνου και οξυγόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la energía 
release/versión en la formación del agua de los átomos del 
hidrógeno y de oxígeno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie de formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reação química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia da formação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazione chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia di formazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημική αντίδραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενέργεια σχηματισμού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reacción química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía de la formación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
